summary: If your browser does not support pdf embeddings, please use this link.

Performed numerical investigations of cross-flow past rotating cylinders in tandem on ANSYS Fluent to study the impact of relative sizing, spacing and rotation rate of the cylinders on their hydrodynamics and vortex shedding frequencies.
title: Hydrodynamics and vortex shedding characteristics of cross flow past rotating cylinders in tandem

summary: Course project for design of heat exchangers and design optimization courses. Wrote a MATLAB code for the thermal design based on variable thermal parameters, material properties, physical structure and pressure drop in accordance with TEMA guidelines. Later included particle swarm optimisation to optimise the output design.
title: Optimisation of the thermal design of the shell and tube heat exchanger

summary: Studying the variation in the behaviour of two dimensional vorticity in the presence of a stochastic vorticity field with varying relative strengths between the deterministic and the stochastic vorticity fields.
title: Stochastic parametrization of two dimensional vorticity equation
